description: This file defines and configures an 'Agent' object named 'study_partner' with specific tools, model, and instructions for assisting users in learning topics, exemplified by a sample interaction about Postgres.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an intelligent agent with a name, model, tools, and instructions for interaction.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output or stream a response from the agent based on user input.
